description: Prune Lime and Sycamore trees in back and front garden.  Works:FRONT GARDEN. Group of Lime regrowths by front boundary wall - Reduce crown overall by one third.Lift to 10' all around and tidy up.Sycamore (close to boundary wall) - remove epicormic growth from base and trunk.thin crown by 50%.Cut back to ensure 2m. clearance from brickwork and gutters. BACK GARDEN: Lime tree close to building - remove small growth to a height of 8'.Cut back to give 1m. clearance from brickwork and gutters.Reduce overall by one third. Reshape and tidy.Sycamore close to patio - cut back basal growth.Remove epicormic growth from trunk. Reduce crown overall by one third.Reshape and tidy up.
